description: Create a job production plan time card approver
permissions: Allowed only if the user can update the associated job production plan (per JobProductionPlan policy).
side_effects: Creates a job production plan time card approver record. On create, the server attempts to create a job production plan subscription for the user when contactable, and may enqueue a notification when the feature flag for time card approver notifications is enabled.
validation_notes: --job-production-plan and --user are required. The user must be related to the job production plan (admin or member of the plan's customer or broker) or the server rejects the request.
